name: The Adventures of Alpha Flight Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: The Avengers have Hulk and the X-Men have Colossus, but who is the resident powerhouse of Alpha Flight?
questions.explanation:
Sasquatch.

	Langowski is an acclaimed scientist and once played football for the Green Bay Packers. He can transform into an orange-furred beast of incredible strength! In his Sasquatch form, Langowski is ten feet tall!

questions.text: Who was meant to lead Alpha Flight?
questions.explanation:
Wolverine.

	Logan was found in the Canadian wilderness by James MacDonald Hudson and his wife Heather. Nursed back to health and sanity, he was offered command of Alpha Flight, but refused.

questions.text: In the 163rd issue of the second volume of "X-Men", whom does Northstar defeat?
questions.explanation:
Sabretooth.

	Northstar is a founding member of Alpha Flight and is capable of superspeed and flight. He has defeated Sabretooth in battle and has hurt the Hulk.

questions.text: In issue 100 of "Alpha Flight", Vindicator and Guardian work together to defeat which villain?
questions.explanation:
Galactus.

	Galactus is an intergalactic threat which has threatened Earth time and time again. He has had many run-ins with the Silver Surfer and with The Fantastic Four.

questions.text: When Sasquatch was possessed by Tanaraq, who killed him?
questions.explanation:
Snowbird.

	Snowbird can change into many animals and beasts. Snowbird transformed into Tanaraq itself and ripped out Sasquatch's heart!

questions.text: Which aquatic hero did Marrina marry?
questions.explanation:
Namor.

	Marrina is a green-skinned aquatic superheroine, so the two went well together. Although this isn't a physical feat, Namor can be very stubborn, arrogant and mercurial.

questions.text: In the seventy-fourth issue of "Alpha Flight", whom does Diamond Lil kill?
questions.explanation:
Spider-Man.

	Alpha Flight was transported to a different reality where superheroes ruled the world and James MacDonald Hudson was Prime Minister of Canada! Diamond Lil fought with this reality's Spider-Man, swinging him into a brick wall and crushing his skull.

questions.text: In "Uncanny X-Men" #120, Northstar and Aurora defeat which X-Man?
questions.explanation:
Nightcrawler.

	Angel was not a member of the team at that time. Aurora and Northstar blinded Nightcrawler and then knocked him out with one punch. Northstar later uses his super-speed to defeat Storm.

questions.text: Vindicator's forcefield broke Lady Deathstrike's claws.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It broke her sword, not her claws. However, the sword was as hard as Wolverine's adamantium claws. In the Marvel universe, adamantium is the hardest metal.

	Eugene Milton Judd was a mercenary who was hired to steal the Black Blade of Baghdad. Unwittingly freeing an evil demon, Judd sacrificed his own life force to defeat it. Left three feet tall, his aging is slowed by an enormous amount.
